synonyms.synonym: Tumor necrosis factor ligand superfamily member 5

protein.general_function: Involved in tumor necrosis factor receptor binding
protein.specific_function: Release of soluble CD40L from platelets is partially regulated by GP IIb/IIIa, actin polymerization, and an matrix metalloproteinases (MMP) inhibitor-sensitive pathway

go_class.description: tumor necrosis factor receptor superfamily binding
